To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.title: Support Terms
settings.text:
Please add our email: support@halothemes.com to your address book to ensure our response email isn’t marked as spam mail.

What does support include?

Plus, item support includes:

-  Availability to answer questions

-  Get assistance with reported product bugs and issues

Item support does not includes:

-  Customization requests

-  Product Installations services

We will try our best to reply your emails as soon as possible. However, we will prioritise email regarding Theme features and issues.

We will reply your email regarding Theme features and issues within 24 hours. Regarding emails about template customisation, we will reply you within 48 hours (but normally much sooner).

Your opinions is highly appreciated and help us built better products.

Thank you, HaloThemes Team.

settings.question_faqs: What is Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ is an innovative, fully-automatic mixer grinder designed to make your kitchen tasks easier and more efficient. It offers pre-programmed menus for different food items, runs at high speed, and comes with multiple safety features.

settings.question_faqs: How does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> work?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ operates completely automatically. Just fill up the jar with ingredients, choose your pre-programmed function, and press the start button. It handles the grinding and blending while you enjoy the freedom to multitask as it stops automatically.

settings.question_faqs: Why is Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> better than ordinary mixer grinders?
settings.answer_faqs: Unlike ordinary mixer grinders, Nutri-blend SMART™ is fully automatic, has pre-programmed functions for common recipes, a double pulse function for perfect results, and stops automatically after the operation. It offers a superior speed of operation, comes with in-built safety mechanisms, and allows for modular upgrades.

settings.question_faqs: What does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>'s warranty cover?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ comes with a 2-Year on-site warranty that covers all manufacturing defects. It ensures peace of mind for our customers.

settings.question_faqs: Can I use Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> for dry grinding?
settings.answer_faqs: Absolutely, Nutri-blend SMART™ is pre-programmed for dry grinding. You can use it for spices, nuts, and more.

settings.question_faqs: How does the Double Pulse Technology of Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> benefit me?
settings.answer_faqs: Once the Nutri-blend SMART™ starts, it stops twice for 2 seconds after every 4 seconds. This Double Pulse Technology allows the content to settle down and fall back on the blades for perfect blending, ensuring consistent results and freeing you from the need to intervene manually during the operation.

settings.question_faqs: Does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> have any safety features?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, Nutri-blend SMART™ is designed with safety in mind. It comes with LED lights, audio indicators, and a safety mechanism that only allows operation when the jar is safely locked in position.

settings.question_faqs: What kind of jars does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> come with?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ comes with two transparent, unbreakable PC jars - The tall (500ml) with a 4-wing blade and short jars (300ml) with a 2-wing flat blade are perfect for mixing-blending and grinding, respectively. These jars offer complete visibility of the operation, freeing you to perform other tasks while Nutri-blend SMART™ does its job.

settings.question_faqs: What is the speed of operation for Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ operates at a very high speed of 22,000 RPM. That's twice the speed of normal mixer grinders, delivering superior blending and grinding.

settings.question_faqs: Can I upgrade my Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Absolutely, Nutri-blend SMART™ allows for modular upgrades. You can easily turn it into a food processor, chopper, and more by purchasing additional attachments.

settings.question_faqs: Is Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> compact and portable?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, Nutri-blend SMART™ is designed to fit comfortably in Indian kitchens. It's compact and extremely portable.

settings.question_faqs: Does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> require manual intervention during operation?
settings.answer_faqs: No, Nutri-blend SMART™ is fully automatic. It starts and stops on its own, freeing you from constant supervision. To start the operation, you can select from the pre-defined functions (recipe or time) and then Nutri-blend SMART™ will complete the operation on its own.

settings.question_faqs: What is the capacity of the jars provided with Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ comes with a tall jar (500ml) for blending and a short jar (300ml) for grinding.

settings.question_faqs: What kind of blades does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> use?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ uses super-sharp surgical-grade stainless steel blades that are meticulously crafted for optimal performance and exceptional results.

settings.question_faqs: How does Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> handle leakage during operation?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ has a leak-proof design. The UV-bonded silicon gasket guarantees a complete seal between the jar and the base, ensuring zero leakage during operation.

settings.question_faqs: Can Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> make chutneys and smoothies?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, Nutri-blend SMART™ is pre-programmed to make chutneys and smoothies. Just select the function, and the machine does the rest.

settings.question_faqs: What material is the motor made of in Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™ features a powerful 500 Watt, 100% Copper motor capable of grinding even the toughest ingredients.

settings.question_faqs: Can Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> handle a large quantity of food?
settings.answer_faqs: Nutri-blend SMART™'s high-speed operation and smart design ensure efficient blending and grinding, even when dealing with larger quantities.

settings.question_faqs: What type of recipes can I make with Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: With its pre-programmed functions, Nutri-blend SMART™ can help prepare a wide range of recipes such as chutneys, smoothies, spice mixes, and more. Nutri-blend SMART™ comes with an exclusive recipe book by Chef Sanjeev Kapoor with 120+ healthy and unique recipes for you to explore.

settings.question_faqs: Where can I buy attachments or accessories for Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: You can easily order additional attachments for your Nutri-blend SMART™ from

settings.question_faqs: Can Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> do everything that a regular mixer grinder does?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Wonderchef Nutri-blend SMART™ is designed to keep the Indian kitchen and its varied needs in mind. You can use it for smoothies, finely ground masalas, chutneys, chopped veggies, etc., in no time. As this is an all-in-one device, you can keep adding the chopper, juicer & food processor attachments separately as per your needs.

settings.question_faqs: How to clean Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: Cleaning Nutri-blend is a hassle-free process. Post usage, power off and unplug the base and then unscrew the base from the jar. Rinse the blades and cup with either warm or normal soap water. It can be done either by sponge or hand. For best, long-term performance, ensure you clean your Nutri-blend as soon as possible post usage.

settings.question_faqs: What accessories come with Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>?
settings.answer_faqs: This model of Wonderchef Nutri-blend comes with a motor base, two jars (long and short), a set of 2 blades for grinding (2-wing flatbed) and blending (4-wing), and two useful lids for storing and sprinkling, and a sipper lid. Every customer also gets access to an exclusive recipe book that has been specially curated by the renowned Chef Sanjeev Kapoor.

Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select image and text that relates to your style and story.

Yes it is.

Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: ella-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip in the folder Ella Sections Ready 3.0.0, then you just need to upload ella-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.title: 3 Pre-Set Programs
settings.description: Equipped with 3 pre-programmed menus, Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> is your personal chef, perfectly grinding dry ingredients, blending smoothies, and whipping up delightful chutneys. With its advanced microcontroller, it handles operations and stops it automatically so that you can focus on savouring the results.

settings.title: Double Pulse Technology
settings.description: The Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> operates with a rhythmic dance, pausing twice for 2 seconds after every 4 seconds. This innovative feature, common to high-end blenders, ensures perfect blending by allowing contents to settle back onto the blades instead of sticking to the sides.

settings.title: India’s First Fully Automatic Mixer Grinder
Complete Independence
settings.description: No need to stand watching and holding your mixer-grinder anymore. Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> sets you free. It operates independently, allowing you to do parallel tasks when you are stressed for time every morning. It's your ultimate kitchen robot.

settings.title: Pre-set Programs
settings.description: First time ever, a mixer that’s pre-programmed to deliver the perfect chutney, masala and smoothies with 30, 45, and 60 sec pre-set buttons. Just press and move on to other kitchen tasks or catch up on your phone. Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> will stop automatically once the job is done.

settings.title: Double-Pulse Function
settings.description: Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> redefines quality. The mixer will stop twice for 2 seconds and restart on its own. This is to enhance the consistency of your mix by drawing the contents back to the blades at the bottom of the jar.

settings.title: See What’s Inside
settings.description: Transparent yet unbreakable polycarbonate jars allow you to achieve perfection in your mixing, grinding and blending without opening your jars repeatedly.

settings.title: Lorem Ipsum
settings.description: dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor

settings.title: Lorem Ipsum
settings.description: dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor

settings.title: Nutri-blend SMART™- Sets You Free
settings.text_link: Enjoy ultimate freedom with the unique patented features of Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>

settings.title: Nutri-blend SMART™
settings.description1: Equipped with pre-programmed functions for common recipes (like chutney, dry grind, smoothies) and variable operation timings (30, 45, 60 seconds), Nutri-blend SMART™ liberates users to multitask in the kitchen.
settings.description2: Each operation cycle incorporates a double pulse function, ensuring ingredients settle optimally during operation for consistent results.
settings.description3: After completion, Nutri-blend SMART™ brings itself to a halt, signaled by an audible beep.
settings.description4: With Nutri-blend SMART™, users can watch blending progress in real-time, eliminating the need to pause and open the jar.
settings.description5: Performing at lightning speed of 22,000 RPM - twice the speed of ordinary mixers, Nutri-blend SMART™ delivers superior blending and grinding.
settings.description6: With LED lights, audio indicators, and a safety mechanism that permits operation only with a correctly locked jar, Nutri-blend SMART™ prioritizes your safety.
settings.description7: Designed with modern Indian kitchens in mind, Nutri-blend SMART™ is sleek, compact, and highly portable.
settings.description8: Upgrade your Nutri-blend SMART™ into a food processor or a chopper with ease as your needs evolve.

settings.title: Ordinary Mixer Grinder
settings.description1: Users need to manually select the speed of blade rotation and be present for the entire operation due to the lack of automatic functions.
settings.description2: Requires users to manually adjust ingredients mid-cycle using spatula or spoons, wasting time and effort.
settings.description3: Regular mixer grinders require users to end the operation.
settings.description4: Regular steel jars offer no visibility, necessitating frequent cycle interruptions to check progress requiring users to be stationed at the mixer grinder.
settings.description5: Operates at a speed of up to 12,000 RPM, requiring more time and energy for task completion.
settings.description6: Ordinary mixer grinders lack built-in safety features, leading to potential risks if not used carefully.
settings.description7: Regular mixer grinders occupy significant kitchen counter space, contributing to clutter.
settings.description8: Regular mixer grinders do not permit easy upgrades, often necessitating costly new purchases.

settings.title: Mixers Ka Smart Upgrade - Nutri-blend SMART<sup class="gradiant">™</sup>
Priya S., New Delhi
settings.description: "I'm so glad I upgraded to Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup>! Now, I can leave it running and focus on my recipes.. Kitchen tasks have never been this easy!"

settings.title: Anjali B., Cochin
settings.description: "I can't recommend Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> enough! It's compact, it's safe, and it gets the job done perfectly. It's honestly the best addition to my kitchen in a long time."

settings.title: Sanjoy D., Kolkata
settings.description: "The quality Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> delivers is just unmatched. My smoothies are so smooth, and my chutneys have never tasted better. It's simply amazing!"

settings.title: Rakesh M., Bhopal
settings.description: "The pre-set functions on Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> are a lifesaver. I get the perfect grind every time without having to stand over it or guess if the grinding is complete. Such a relief!"

settings.title: Jyothi K., Bangalore
settings.description: "I love that I don't have to stand by the mixer anymore. Nutri-blend SMART<sup>™</sup> works independently, letting me multitask in the kitchen."
